description: Listerine FreshBurst Antibacterial Mouthwash kills germs that cause bad breath & plaque.  Listerine FreshBurst Antibacterial Mouthwash kills germs that cause bad breath & plaque. Listerine FreshBurst gives you a deeper whole mouth clean than brushing alone. It:  - Kills germs that cause bad breath. - Helps prevent and reduce plaque. - Provides long lasting fresh breath - Maintains healthy gums  Listerine FreshBurst Mouthwash is a suitable mouthwash for bad breath and reducing plaque. For a fresher and cleaner mouth than brushing alone.   Ever wondered why you need to incorporate an anti-bacterial mouthwash as part of your oral care routine? Brushing and flossing alone only reaches 25% of your mouth. Incorporating ListerineÂ® as your third step helps to kill germs in the remaining 75% of the mouth and can help reduce plaque to help provide that long-lasting fresh breath.   Listerine Antibacterial Mouthwash works to get rid of bad breath fast.  Antibacterial Mouthwash  250mL  Kills germs causing bad breath & plaque
name: Listerine Fresh Burst Mouthwash 250ml
